title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Optimizing Human-Machine Interaction Using Cognitive Load Monitoring

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts and comprehension of physiological signals (e.g., EEG)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of cognitive workload monitoring (CWM) and its applications in human-machine interaction
Learners can design EEG signal processing and machine learning model optimization strategies in resource-constrained environments
Learners can interpret performance metrics (accuracy, sensitivity, specificity) of wearable device-based cognitive workload classification systems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
